short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the New Tab page with a simple customizable clock.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ABOUT
Bring focus to every new tab you open. No frills or distractions â€“ just the time and date. 

PRIVACY POLICY
This extension has no ads, trackers, or analytics. It requires no permissions. No information is transmitted to or from the extension to any server. All settings are saved locally on your computer.

SETTINGS
Click on the gear in the bottom left to customize the background color, font, or 12/24 clock setting.
